content:
Decision: Persist each statistic as an individual file under src/jarvis/jarvis_stats. 
- File name: metric name
- File content: the metric value
- Update policy: whenever the metric changes, write the file (atomic write)
- Startup behavior: read all metric files at startup; if a metric file is missing, compute it once and save it
- Goal: Avoid expensive real-time computation (utils.py stats display is too slow)
- Notes: Ensure compatibility with existing stats API; minimal invasive changes; handle missing/invalid files gracefully.
